Package org.flowvisor.config

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Bracketable<E>
    This entire thing is a horrible hack around the fact that my XML encoder sucks I should probably find a better way of dealing with that...
    ChangedListener
    Interface for listeners to the data repository.
    ConfDBSettings
    As FV doesn't mandate that derby be the only repository type, we define this interface to enforce that no matter what the data repository is the behaviour of FV will not be modified.
    FlowMapChangedListener
    A listener for a change to the flowmap.
    FlowSpace
    A proxy interface for the flowspace db table.
    Flowvisor
    A proxy interface for flowvisor specific information
    FlowvisorChangedListener  
    FVAppConfig  
    Slice  
    SliceChangedListener  
    Switch  
    SwitchChangedListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BracketParse
    Takes a string of the form "foo[key1=[val1],key2=[val2],]" are returns a hashmap containg ( key1 => val1, key2 => val2, "ObjectName" => foo) Critically, values are untouched, i.e., if they contain more square brackets and commas, they are unaffected
    BracketParseTest  
    ConfDBHandler
    Defines a connection pool to derby.
    ConfigurationEvent  
    FlowSpaceHandler  
    FlowSpaceImpl  
    FlowvisorImpl  
    FVConfig
    Central collection of all configuration and policy information, e.g., slice permissions, what port to run on, etc.
    FVConfigProxy  
    FVConfigurationController  
    LoadConfig
    List of things to populate FVConfig with on startup Everything here can be overridden from the config file.
    SliceImpl  
    SwitchImpl
